Please login to your deezer account: Silahkan Masuk dengan akun Deezer Anda
Create Artist, Albums and CDs folders fo: Buat Folder untuk Artis, Album, CD dan Playlists
Write all Artists in track filename: Tulis semua Artis pada Nama Track Artis
Adds 0s before %number% to have the same: Tambah 0s sebelum %number% agar panjang karakter menjadi sama
Fallback to lower bitrates if preferred: Kembalikan ke Bitrate terendah jika Bitrate yang dipilih tidak tersedia
Fallback to search if song is not availa: Kembalikan ke Pencarian jika Musik tidak tersedia
Download albums with one track as a sing: Download Album yang hanya memiliki Satu Track sebagai Satu Track
Create log file for Errors inside downlo: Buat FIle Log jika terjadi Error di dalam Folder Download
Create log file for Alternatives inside: Buat File Log jika terdapat Alternatif di dalam Folder Download
Replaces albums tags with the playlist o: Ganti Tag Album dengan Tag Playlist
Choose Which Tags To Save: Pilih Tag yang ingin di Simpan
SpotifyFeatures_Info:
"Fitur Spotify" Tidak Akan mendownload Musik dari Spotify.
Fitur ini hanya mengaktifkan pengubah Metadata aplikasi. Jika Musik tidak ada di Deezer, maka musik tersebut tidak dapat di Download
Anda dapat melihat cara mendapatkan ID Client dan Secret Disini
Name: Nama
Label: Label
Title: Judul
Author: Author
Feedback_Text: Apakah anda memiliki Umpan Balik atau ingin menanyakan tentang Fitur Baru? Buka Isu Terbaru dan Tambahkan Label 'Feature'.
Bugs_Text:
Jika anda mengetahui Bug maka periksalah FAQ page.
If you can't find a solution for your problem, open a Isu Baru dan kirimkan Laporan Bug disana, Terimakasih.
Contacts_Text: Jika anda ingin berdiskusi atau mendapatkan bantuan tentang aplikasi, maka anda dapat melihat Group Telegram! (Bahasa Inggris)
Attention_Text:
Author tidak dapat dipangguil untuk melakukan tindakan Kriminal!
Penggunaan Tool ini mungkin saja bisa menjadi ilegal pada Negara anda, silahkan beritahukan diri anda!
Author tidak akan memberikan jaminan dan tidak akan bertanggung jawab atas kesalahan dari apa yang anda lakukan!
Contributions_Text:
Apakah anda ingin berkontribusi pada Project ini? Anda dapat berkontribusi dengan Cara yang Berbeda!

Jika anda sudah mengetahui JavaScript, HTML, CSS atau Node.js maka anda dapat berkontribusi dengan menulis kode, memperbaiki Bug dan menambahkan fitur baru dengan Repository Official.

If you are good at graphics and design you could help by submitting a new design, you can open a new issue with some design here.

Keep in mind that we are (sorta) following the Material Design Principles.

If you are good at finding bugs you can help Beta Test the app before release.
Join our Telegram Group to be notified when betas come out!

You want to contribute monetarily? You could make a donation!

If you can donate you can do that with this links.
You shoud remember that this is a free project and you should support the artists you love before supporting the developer.
Don't feel obligated to donate, I appreciate you anyway!
LinkAnalyzer_Info:
You can use this section to find out more information about the link you are trying to download
This is usefull if you're trying to download some tracks that are not available in your country and want to know where they are available
Somehow you managed to fuck it up. Good:
Somehow you managed to fuck it up. Good job.
Now go do the guide again.

If you need the link again Here it is
You need to restart the app to apply the: You need to restart the app to apply the changes
Changing the spotify settings id and sec: Changing the spotify settings id and secret requires an app restart
spotifyFeaturesMessage:
You should add spotify's clientId and clientSecret in the settings and then restart the app to use this feature
You can see how to do that in this guide

THIS FEATURE DOES'T LET YOU DOWNLOAD FROM SPOTIFY. This just enables a practical in app metadata converter. If a song is not on Deezer it can't be downloaded
Can't find the track on Deezer!: Can't find the track on Deezer!
Can't find the album on Deezer!: Can't find the album on Deezer!
For security reasons, this button will d: For security reasons, this button will do nothing.
Saving replay gain causes tracks to be q: Saving replay gain causes tracks to be quieter for some users.
To change the language you need to refre: To change the language you need to refresh the page or restart the app!
Well, there seems to be a problem with t: Well, there seems to be a problem with this part of the app. Please notify the developer.
You need to insert an URL to download it: You need to insert an URL to download it!
The URL seems to be wrong. Please check: The URL seems to be wrong. Please check it and try it again.
Save Playlist File with folder name: Save Playlist File with folder name
Save single tracks in a folder: Save single tracks in a folder
Deezer is not available in your country: Deezer is not available in your country
Search and Login functions won't work. Y: Search and Login functions won't work. You should use a VPN if you want them.
